Tabs.HeaderText: Welcome To Noobs On The Run Server

TextLines: <color=red>NEXT WIPE 12/21/23</color>
<color=#39FF14>Bi-weekly map wipe, Monthly BP's</color>
<color=#39FF14>Single |  Duo | Trio | Qaud</color>
<color=#39FF14>NO EXCEPTIONS</color>
<color=#39FF14>Team limit of 4 per base, raiding, roaming.</color>
<color=#39FF14>Friendly trades or non KOS is fine.</color>
<color=#39FF14>Full rules can be found on rule tab or on our Discord. Link below</color>
<color=#39FF14>Type</color> <color=orange> /info </color> <color=#39FF14>in chat to open this window</color>
<color=orange>F7</color> <color=#39FF14>and</color> <color=orange>/report</color> <color=#39FF14>to report a player and open a ticket in our discord.</color>
<color=#39FF14>Keep all accusations out of chat.</color>
<color=#39FF14>ESC> To View Webpage</color>
<color=#39FF14>Discord</color> <color=#39FF14>https://discord.gg/hQXFYgtrzZ</color>
<color=#39FF14>Admins are available</color>
<color=orange>/kit</color> <color=#39FF14>Kits</color>
<color=orange>/info</color> <color=#39FF14>Server Info</color>
<color=orange>/tod</color> <color=#39FF14>Time Of Day</color>
<color=orange>/pop</color> <color=#39FF14>Server Population</color>
<color=orange>/viptrial</color> <color=#39FF14>7 Day VIP Trial</color>
<color=orange>/voteday</color> <color=#39FF14>Vote to skip night when voting is open</color>
<color=#39FF14>Thank you for your support!</color>
<color=#39FF14>If you can see this you have access to VIP features. Here is how to access these VIP features.</color>
<color=orange>/bskin</color> <color=#39FF14>Chnage the skin of building skins</color>
<color=orange>/skin</color> <color=#39FF14>Change the skin of items drop item in the loot box on the right</color>
<color=orange>/color</color> <color=#39FF14>Will change the color of your name. Use</color> <color=orange>/colors</color><color=#39FF14> for help/more options</color>
<color=orange>/bgrade</color> <color=#39FF14>Auto update building blocks when placed(0-Disable,1-Wood,2-Stones,3-Metal,4-Armoured)</color>
<color=orange>/backpack</color> <color=#39FF14>To access backpack or use GUI</color>
<color=#39FF14>This is for ADMINS</color>
<color=#39FF14>Here is some usefull commands</color>
<color=orange>/padmin</color> <color=#39FF14>Will bring up the Player Administration GUI</color>
<color=orange>noclip</color> <color=#39FF14>Console command to no clip AKA fly like a bird</color>
<color=orange>/perms</color> <color=#39FF14>To see/change players permissons</color>
<color=orange>admintime x</color> <color=#39FF14>This is to change your game time not players x is the time you want</color>
<color=orange>/voice</color> <color=#39FF14> Display command help to mute players in-game voice.</color>
<color=#39FF14>For more commands see GitHub</color>
<color=#39FF14>This is for MODS</color>
<color=orange>/bgrade</color> <color=#39FF14>Auto update building blocks when placed(0-Disable,1-Wood,2-Stones,3-Metal,4-Armoured)</color>
<color=orange>/bskin</color> <color=#39FF14>Chnage the skin of building skins</color>
<color=orange>/skin</color> <color=#39FF14>Change the skin of items drop item in the loot box on the right</color>
<color=orange>/colour</color> <color=#39FF14>Will change the color of your name. Use</color> <color=orange>/colours</color><color=#39FF14> for help/more options</color>
<color=orange>mute playerID reason </color> <color=#39FF14>In console will mute a player in chat</color>
<color=orange>unmute playerID</color> <color=#39FF14>This is will unmute a player in chat</color>
<color=orange>/voice</color> <color=#39FF14> Display command help to mute players in-game voice.</color>
<color=#39FF14>Thank you for your time and effort.</color>
<color=#39FF14>Any other questions or concerns please reach out to an admin or owner's</color>
SERVER RULES:
<color=#39FF14>Server rules are subject to change. It is your responsibility to familiarize yourself with our rules.</color>
<color=#39FF14>You can find our  list of rules below, by visiting our discord, or looking at the condensed version by typing</color>
<color=orange>/info</color> <color=#39FF14>in gamechat.</color>
<color=#39FF14>If you have any questions about our server or discord rules, or to report a rule breaker or cheater,</color>
<color=#39FF14>please contact us via discord.</color>
1) No racism, sexism, homophobia, ear rape, IRL threats, excessive toxicity, pornographic/obscene
<color=#39FF14>material, threats, or griefing and bullying.</color>
- <color=#39FF14>We have a no tolerance policy for threats, racism, sexism, homophobia and pedophilia.</color>
- <color=#39FF14>Obscene or pornographic material is prohibited on our discord or gaming servers.</color>
- <color=#39FF14>Please respect other players and our staff. Normal rust banter is allowed.</color>
2) Follow team limits
- <color=#39FF14>Do not team (raid, pvp, roam, build or farm) with more than 4 players.</color>
- <color=#39FF14>No auths, sleepovers, or bags for players outside of your team members.</color>
- <color=#39FF14>No allies. You can trade and/or be friendly or non Kill on Sight (KoS). Absolutely no raiding, roaming,</color>
<color=#39FF14>or farming with anyone beyond your team.</color>
- <color=#39FF14>Team hopping to evade the team limits is not allowed. Only permanent, reasonable changes</color>
<color=#39FF14>allowed during a wipe.</color>
- <color=#39FF14>Absolutely no pooling of resources between teams. Only your team can farm resources for your base.</color>
<color=#39FF14> (You can purchase or trade)</color>
3) Cheaters, scripters, exploiters will be banned on sight. No streamsniping.
- <color=#39FF14>Rust game bans will result in a permanent ban on our server.</color>
- <color=#39FF14>Recent (365 days) VAC bans will result in an auto-ban on our server.</color>
- <color=#39FF14>Cheater bases and loot will be despawned.</color>
- <color=#39FF14>Teammates and associated players of cheaters will be banned by association.</color>
- <color=#39FF14>Players who associate in cheating communities will be banned.</color>
<color=#39FF14>Griefing - Griefing is handled on a case-by-case basis. We do not consider most normal</color>
<color=#39FF14>rust gameplay griefing. If you have a concern whether some behavior is griefing.</color>
<color=#39FF14>Please reach out to us to open a support ticket on discord.</color>
<color=#39FF14>Sealing is appropriate during the raid, to move in and claim as your main base,</color>
<color=#39FF14>and while transporting loot.</color>
